zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：震荡整理，短期略偏弱
zh.content:
当前以太坊/美元(ETH/USD)价格为1849.81美元，市场呈现震荡整理状态，价格区间相对狭窄。24小时的价格变化较小，仅为-0.27%，显示出市场短期内缺乏方向性。近期价格波动范围在1847.47至1862.41之间，显示出市场的暂时观望情绪。

从技术指标来看，RSI(14)数据尚未提供，但MACD为负值(-6.48933)，表明短期内卖压较强。当前价格低于SMA(20)的1837.18，进一步确认了市场的弱势格局。MACD处于负值区间且没有明显的信号线交叉，表明下行压力依然存在。

支撑位方面，1847.47为短期的关键支撑，若突破该位置，可能会继续测试1837附近的支撑区域。上方的阻力位在1862.41附近，若价格反弹至该区域，可能遇到一定的卖压，导致价格承压回落。

综合来看，短期内ETH/USD维持震荡整理，建议投资者保持观望或在支撑位附近寻找低风险的短期交易机会。若价格跌破1847.47支撑，可能会迎来进一步的回调，需谨慎操作。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is currently experiencing a slight downtrend, trading at $1849.81 with a minor 24-hour change of -0.27%. The price has been constrained within a narrow range, bouncing between a high of $1862.41 and a low of $1847.47. This sideways action indicates market indecision, with neither the bulls nor bears taking clear control. Given the current price proximity to the 20-period SMA at $1837.18, ETH may face further pressure if it fails to reclaim higher levels. 

The MACD value is negative at -6.48933, suggesting a bearish sentiment in the short term. This momentum oscillator reflects downward price action, with the lack of a signal line hindering a clearer view of potential trend reversals. Traders should monitor for any divergence between the MACD and price as it could signal shifts in momentum. A bullish reversal would require the MACD to climb above zero, signaling a potential buying opportunity. 

Key support levels are seen near $1847, where ETH has bounced recently, while resistance looms at $1862.41. If Ethereum breaks below the $1847 level, it could test further downside towards the SMA, with $1837 acting as a critical support point. Conversely, if the price surges above $1862.41, the next potential resistance is around $1880, where the price could encounter resistance. Keeping an eye on these levels will be essential for determining the next move.

Traders should consider short-term price action within these defined ranges. A break below support could signal a short position, while a move above resistance might provide a better entry point for long trades. Monitoring the broader market sentiment and volume could help confirm the direction of the next price movement.
